scripts.android: npm run build && npx cap run android
scripts.compile:before: npm run build && npm run assets
scripts.compile:
npm run compile:before && npx cap sync android && cd android/ && ./gradlew build && echo "
Compiled over android/app/build/outputs/apk/release
"
scripts.signed:
npm run compile:before && npx cap sync android && cd android/ && ./gradlew assembleRelease --stacktrace && echo "
Compiled over android/app/build/outputs/apk/release
"
scripts.bundle:
npm run compile:before && npx cap sync android && cd android/ && ./gradlew bundleRelease --stacktrace && echo "
Compiled over android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release
"
